channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2024101571
item.description:
Report X-2024101571

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-27T18:24:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-17
  • City: BOSTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The shipment was discovered by Security and held. The inner contents were clothing and perfume. the 2 bottles of perfume are not full and there was no evidence of a spill, however 1 bottle has a capacity of 80ml (Hypnotic Vanilla Parfum Zara) is 50% full. The second bottle, Zara Golden Decade, capacity 30 ml, only 25% full. The shipment is being held for FAA investigation.

item.title: Report X-2024101285
item.description:
Report X-2024101285

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-22T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-07
  • City: W SPRINGFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE DUE TO THE RATTLE OF AEROSOL CANS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED (4) 4 OUNCE AEROSOL CANS OF FLAMMABLE AVON SKIN SO SOFT INSECT REPELLENT. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. INVOICE AND THERMAL LABEL DESCRIPTION IS SUNTAN LOTION. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM MASSACHUSETTS USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 6VR107, FREIGHTCOM, 9220 BASS LAKE RD, MINNEAPOLIS MN 55428-3115. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
